de.ralleytn.simple.audio

Class AbstractAudio

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.audio.AbstractAudio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Audio
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferedAudio, StreamedAudio

    public abstract class AbstractAudio
extends java.lang.Object
implements Audio
    Implements the Audio and should be extended by all classes representing a form of playable audio.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)
